overview: During WWII, Lili has troubles working as a dancer in a cabaret when she is noticed by Madame Kitty, an owner of a brothel. Madame Kitty decides to take this lady in to keep the brothel clean and help the other girls out in return. Very soon Lili is overcome with excitement and desires of all the action taking place there and falls in love with one of the customers, Albert, a charming young soldier. But before they know it, the war has separated them and leaves them heartbroken and devastated. Can they ever meet again?
title: Lili
